Title: Great Expectations
Original title: Great Expectations
Country: United Kingdom, USA
USA release:
Released in Spain: 27/03/2013
Released on DVD (rental): 07/24/2013
UK release: 30/11/2012
Studio: Number 9 Films, Ulti-Media
Directed by Mike Newell
Writer: David Nicholls
Cast: Helena Bonham Carter, Ralph Fiennes, Jason Flemyng, Robbie Coltrane, Jeremy Irvine, Holliday Grainger, Ewen Bremner, Sophie Rundle, Sally Hawkins, David Walliams, Jessie Cave, Ralph Ineson, Tamzin Outhwaite, Olly Alexander, Malcolm Tierney

Synopsis:
The young orphan Pip leaves behind his humble beginnings thanks to a mysterious benefactor. Moving in London society as a gentleman, Pip uses his new position to seduce the beautiful Estella, an heiress he loves since childhood. However, the terrible truth behind his great fortune will have devastating consequences for everything he holds dear.

Production notes:
- New adaptation of Charles Dickens literary classic.
